diff_hunk:
@@ -65,6 +65,7 @@ option(BUILD_DOCS "Build Caffe2 documentation" OFF)
 option(BUILD_CUSTOM_PROTOBUF "Build and use Caffe2's own protobuf under third_party" ON)
 option(BUILD_PYTHON "Build Python binaries" ON)
 option(BUILD_CAFFE2_OPS "Build Caffe2 operators" ON)
+option(INCLUDE_EXPERIMENTAL_C10_OPS "Include caffe2/operators/experimental/c10 sources" ON)
body:
Do you still need this? It doesn't look like you set it anywhere below. If you still need to keep this can you please standardize to something like

```
option(BUILD_C10_EXPERIMENTAL_OPS "Build c10 experimental operators" ON)
```
This would match the other flags.
